Name: Strength & Virtue: Trials of the Romer
About the game: In the East of the politically-unbalanced region of Midland, there is a place where no city-dweller would dare tread; home of the Romer or 'People of the Wastes.' A stoic people of devout religious beliefs, the Romer wander the wastes seeking enlightenment from the gods, often falling prey to the many dangers of such a place. Play as one of these Nomadic peoples as he meets a city-dweller and begins to question all he has been taught. There is no easy path here, only a brutal landscape that only the strongest will survive. Features: 2.5D Atmospheric RPG Grounded medieval-era setting - no magic! Survival mechanics - find food, water and rest to survive the harshness of the wastes A mix of field-overview and 1st-person dungeon gameplay modes Strategic ATB battles that encourage strategic thought utilizing different weapon and skill types Day/Night cycles with dynamic lighting/shadows Open-form exploration - uncover mysteries of this world but beware aggressive creatures! Set within the ever-expanding world of Taharen Custom key binding and controller support
